content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --NOMDY
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000245
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --NOMDY is present.
Outcome:
  Message: --NOMDY is present.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0510
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The following SDTM variables, defined for use in non-clinical
                  studies (SEND), must NEVER be used in the submission of SDTM-based
                  data for human clinical trials --USCHFL (Interventions, Events,
                  Findings) --DTHREL (Findings) --EXCLFL (Findings) --REASEX (Findings)
                  --IMPLBL (Findings) FETUSID (Identifiers) --DETECT (Timing Variables)
                  --NOMDY (Timing Variables) --NOMLBL (Timing Variables)
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: SDTM Variables Not Allowed in SDTMIG
                Section: '2.7'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --NOMDY is present.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The following SDTM variables, defined for use in non-clinical studies (SEND), must NEVER be used in the submission of SDTM-based data for human clinical trials --USCHFL (Interventions, Events, Findings) --DTHREL (Findings) --EXCLFL (Findings) --REASEX (Findings) --IMPLBL (Findings) FETUSID (Identifiers) --DETECT (Timing Variables) --NOMDY (Timing Variables) --NOMLBL (Timing Variables)
Citations.Item: SDTM Variables Not Allowed in SDTMIG
